content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of: Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)  
Use-case: Smelts iron ore into iron plates to support subsequent crafting, including attempts at Lab production.

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of: Copper Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)  
Use-case: Converts copper ore into copper plates to enable production of copper cables and related components for Lab crafting.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Incorrect use of the get_entities API  
  – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or extra positional parameters. Use the correct function signature to prevent TypeError issues.

• Lab placement and crafting failures  
  – Ensure that the Lab item is present in inventory before attempting to place it at a specific position.  
  – Guard against None values when retrieving entities by substituting with an empty list to avoid iteration errors.  
  – Verify that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available or producible before initiating Lab crafting.

• Resource chain inadequacies  
  – Confirm that smelting and production facilities supply sufficient materials (iron plates, copper plates, etc.) to meet the recipe requirements for Lab crafting.  
  – Scale resource conversion processes appropriately to avoid shortages that prevent successful crafting.
